name: flickspire
author: flickspire

sections.description:
Embed flickspire movies in your wordpress blog.

Currently requires an active flickspire viral video system account to attain movie codes.

Frequently asked ques tions

Can anyone use this plugin?

No, this plugin currently requires an active flickspire viral video system account to attain movie codes.

How do I embed my movies?

You can embed your flickspire movies using this shortcode syntax:

[fsmovie]movie=MovieCode&custcode=YourFlickspireCustomerCode[/fsmovie]
sections.installation:
1. Upload ‘flickspire’ to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory

  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

  3. Use the [fsmovie]movie=MovieCode&custcode=YourFlickspireCustomerCode[/fsmovie] shortcode in your posts
sections.changelog:
1.0.5

  • Add support for themes that display full post on category pages. Replace shortcode with link to post rather than displaying movie.

1.0.4

  • Minor code changes to curl set options for future development.

1.0.3

  • Resolved issue with FB missing href notification
  • Updated to share permalink instead of full url when Sharing and posting FB comments if additional url parameters are present
  • Update to resolve conflicts with other plugins using jquery

1.0.2

  • Resolved issue with new optins seeing optin instead of share on subsequent movie views
  • Resolved issue where errors occurred when having too much copy after the shortcode

1.0.1

  • Resolved issue with wp html editor html encoding shortcode paramaters that sometimes caused incorrect custcode to be used

1.0.0

  • 1st Publish
